title: [URGENT] Week 0 Script: 0.1 Introduction to Climate Science
description: Write 12-min script for introductory climate science lesson. Include hook, learning objectives, 3-4 content segments, summary, transition. Target: 1500-2000 words. DUE: Jan 17 EOD
close_reason: Script complete: 1,825 words, 12:10 duration. Includes Thailand/ASEAN context. Location: scripts/week0_commitment/0.1_intro_climate_science.md

title: [URGENT] Week 0 Script: 0.2 Greenhouse Effect and Carbon Cycle
description: Write 15-min script. Include greenhouse effect mechanisms, carbon cycle dynamics, Thailand context. Target: 2000-2500 words. DUE: Jan 17 EOD
close_reason: Script 0.2 complete. 2,101 words covering greenhouse effect mechanisms, carbon cycle dynamics, and Thailand context.

close_reason: All 5 Week 0 slides completely redesigned and pushed. Flexbox layout fixes text overlap, visual elements added, citations for all stats, geographic balance achieved. Commit a566e85. Ready for audio production.

title: [URGENT] Commitment Quiz Design
description: Create 15 MCQ questions covering all Week 0 content. 70% passing threshold. Include plausible distractors, explanations. Must be challenging but fair for PhD students. DUE: Jan 17 EOD
close_reason: Commitment Quiz created with 15 MCQ questions covering all Week 0 content. Includes challenging questions on climate science fundamentals, greenhouse effect, carbon cycle, climate indicators, and policy importance. All questions have detailed explanations and plausible distractors. Saved to quizzes/gate/commitment_quiz.json

comments.author: psu_teaching/crew/moodle_admin
comments.text:
âœ… DEPLOYMENT COMPLETE

Moodle 4.4 successfully deployed on velocity server:
- URL: http://velocity:8080 (accessible via Tailscale)
- Port binding: 0.0.0.0:8080 (fixed)
- Hostname redirect: velocity (fixed)
- Admin: admin / Admin123!PSU
- Database: MariaDB 10.11
- Helper script: ~/moodle-docker/moodle-ctl

Materials ready on server:
- commitment_quiz.xml (23KB)
- week0_ipcc_reading.html (17KB)
- WEB_SETUP_GUIDE.md (step-by-step configuration)

Next: Awaiting overseer to complete web interface setup (~30-45 min)
Follow WEB_SETUP_GUIDE.md for quiz import, reading upload, PSU branding, gate setup, and testing.

Then awaiting content from planner:
- Slides (~6:30 PM)
- Audio (~8 PM)
- Videos from video_producer (Jan 18 EOD)

title: [URGENT] Week 0 Reading: IPCC AR6 Summary
description: Curate IPCC AR6 Summary for Week 0. Extract key findings, create reading guide with takeaways, reflection questions, connection to lessons. DUE: Jan 17 EOD
close_reason:
Reading guide complete at workshops/climate_policy/readings/week0_ipcc_ar6_summary.md

Includes:
- IPCC AR6 Synthesis Report SPM as primary source
- 7 comprehensive key takeaways (current state, timelines, impacts, mitigation, adaptation, CDR, finance)
- 13 reflection questions connecting to course content
- Detailed connections to all Week 0 lessons and future modules
- Additional resources and interactive tools
- Research Fellow PhD context

Ready for student use in Commitment Week.
